title: Introducing Invulnerability HUD
body:
Have you ever been sad when a big attack lands on its target only to find out they're invulnerable?

Have you wanted to know that the health bar you're about to lay into can't be moved?

Did you see the [Taric Ult](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qNk6uNCLuDo&t=7m) in the Ryze Champion Spotlight and wondered wtf?

Well, have we got the feature for you!  It's Invulnerability HUD, (most likely) coming in Patch 6.18!

http://i.imgur.com/wnEcDRg.gif

We've added a fancy gold border to champion's health bars when they can't be touched.  In addition, we pulled a couple abilities that acted a lot like invulnerability and went ahead and made them fully embrace invulnerability.  We're hoping this makes interacting (or not) with invulnerable champions a less frustrating experience.  If we've bounced off that target please let us know in the comments below.

Yi can still be damaged and killed by DoTs while Alpha striking, Fizz and Vlad can be hurt by both DoTs and tethers while troll poling/troll pooling.
